question: You have created a link to the LinkedIn website by selecting the link text and typing “www.LinkedIn.com” into the Link field of the Dreamweaver Property Inspector dialog box. But when you come to test it, it doesn't work. What's the problem?
options: There's nothing wrong with the link. If it fails, it's because the internet connection is down.
You can't test external links in Dreamweaver. You need to load the page into a browser for testing.
URLs are case-sensitive and should always be in lowercase.
If links aren't prefixed by http:// or https://, browsers treat them as internal links relative to the current page.
answer: If links aren't prefixed by http:// or https://, browsers treat them as internal links relative to the current page.
